title: Awe
text: It is just Amazing i felt the Awe of the great Greece history in this archeologic place which everyone must visit it.!!

title: ABSOLUTE TRANQUILITY
text:
I found this place through a friend...
I wanted a different experience, and indeed. !!
It was totally different with seven stars quality in all areas.
Definitely I'll come back : -)

title: Continue relaxation
text: After amazing experience in they SPA we enjoyed the Arabic food and then Turkish tea with An amazing Hookah ( SHISHA).!
